content.title: MANDEL: Justice at last for Sammy Yatim - Toronto Sun
content.desc: At long last, Sammy Yatim can rest in peace.With the Supreme Court's refusal to hear an appeal of his conviction and sentence, James Forcillo is out of options.

content.title: Supreme Court will not hear appeal of Toronto cop who shot teen on streetcar - Global News

content.desc: Forcillo was convicted of attempted murder in Yatim's 2013 shooting death. He had applied to have his case heard at Canada's highest court after the Ontario ...

content.title: Supreme Court to deliver ruling on leave to appeal for Toronto cop convicted in death of Sammy Yatim - Global News
content.desc: April 30, 2018: Ontario's highest court has rejected the appeal of James Forcillo, the Toronto police officer convicted in the 2013 shooting death of Sammy Yatim, ...
